languages.text: {n}Вигдис на мгновение замолкает, то ли переваривая услышанное, то ли наводя справки по другим вокс-каналам. Наконец, вокс снова оживает.{/n} "Нет, Ваша Светлость, такой примечательный персонаж вряд ли бы остался незамеченным. Я оповещу вас, если команда доложит о чем-то подобном".

{n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис на мгновение замолкает, то ли переваривая услышанное, то ли наводя справки по другим вокс-каналам. Наконец, вокс снова оживает.{/n} "Нет, Ваша Светлость, такой примечательный персонаж вряд ли бы остался незамеченным. Я оповещу вас, если команда доложит о чем-то подобном".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she has just heard, or making confirmations in other vox-channels. At last vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, such a notable character would definitely not remain unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports of something like this."

{n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she has just heard, or making confirmations in other vox-channels. At last vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, such a notable character would definitely not remain unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports of something like this."

{n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she has just heard, or cross-checking other vox-channels. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, such a notable character would definitely not remain unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports of anyone like that."

{n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she has just heard, or cross-checking other vox-channels. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, such a notable character would definitely not remain unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports of anyone like that."

{n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯安静了一会儿，要么是在努力理解刚刚听到的话，要么是在仔细核查其他音阵频道。最后，音阵中传来了答复。{/n}“没有，大人。如果真的有这样引人注目的人，一定会引起船员的注意。如果船员报告看到了这样的人，我会通知您的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯安静了一会儿，要么是在努力理解刚刚听到的话，要么是在仔细核查其他音阵频道。最后，音阵中传来了答复。{/n}“没有，大人。如果真的有这样引人注目的人，一定会引起船员的注意。如果船员报告看到了这样的人，我会通知您的。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis reste silencieuse un moment, pour digérer ce qu'elle vient d'entendre ou pour mener l'enquête sur ses autres canaux-vox. Au bout d'un certain temps, sa voix finit par se faire entendre à nouveau.{/n} « Non, Votre Seigneurie, et je doute qu'un individu aussi singulier puisse passer inaperçu. Je vous préviendrai si l'équipage confirme la présence d'une personne correspondant à ce signalement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis reste silencieuse un moment, pour digérer ce qu'elle vient d'entendre ou pour mener l'enquête sur ses autres canaux-vox. Au bout d'un certain temps, sa voix finit par se faire entendre à nouveau.{/n} « Non, Votre Seigneurie, et je doute qu'un individu aussi singulier puisse passer inaperçu. Je vous préviendrai si l'équipage confirme la présence d'une personne correspondant à ce signalement. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis verstummt kurz. Entweder um zu verstehen, was sie gerade gehört hat, oder um auf anderen Vox-Kanälen Erkundigungen einzuholen. Schließlich erwacht das Vox-System wieder zum Leben.{/n} "Nein, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und ich bezweifle auch, dass eine solch auffällige Gestalt sich unbemerkt hätte vorbeischleichen können. Ich werde Euch informieren, falls die Crew so jemandem begegnet."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis verstummt kurz. Entweder um zu verstehen, was sie gerade gehört hat, oder um auf anderen Vox-Kanälen Erkundigungen einzuholen. Schließlich erwacht das Vox-System wieder zum Leben.{/n} "Nein, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und ich bezweifle auch, dass eine solch auffällige Gestalt sich unbemerkt hätte vorbeischleichen können. Ich werde Euch informieren, falls die Crew so jemandem begegnet."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis permanece en silencio durante unos instantes, ya sea para procesar lo que acaba de oír o para preguntar en otros canales de voco. Finalmente, el voco vuelve a emitir sonido.{/n} «No, {mf|milord|milady}, y puedo asegurarle que alguien tan singular no pasaría desapercibido. Si la tripulación me informa del avistamiento de algún sujeto similar, se lo haré saber».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis permanece en silencio durante unos instantes, ya sea para procesar lo que acaba de oír o para preguntar en otros canales de voco. Finalmente, el voco vuelve a emitir sonido.{/n} «No, {mf|milord|milady}, y puedo asegurarle que alguien tan singular no pasaría desapercibido. Si la tripulación me informa del avistamiento de algún sujeto similar, se lo haré saber».

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスはしばらくの間沈黙し、今聞いたことを処理しているか、他のヴォクス通信と照合しているのだろう。そしてついにヴォクスから声が聞こえた。{/n}「いいえ、そのような注目すべき人物が気づかれずにいるはずがありません。乗組員からそのような人物の報告があればお知らせします」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスはしばらくの間沈黙し、今聞いたことを処理しているか、他のヴォクス通信と照合しているのだろう。そしてついにヴォクスから声が聞こえた。{/n}「いいえ、そのような注目すべき人物が気づかれずにいるはずがありません。乗組員からそのような人物の報告があればお知らせします」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, bir süre sessiz kalıp ya az evvel duyduklarını idrak etmeye çalışıyor ya da diğer voks kanallarından sorular soruyor. Ardından voks tekrar ötüyor.{/n} "Yoktu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Böylesi dikkat çekici bir şahsın gözden kaçmış olabileceğini de sanmam. Mürettebattan tarif ettiğiniz kişiyi gören olursa size haber vereceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis falls quiet for a moment, either processing what she just heard or making enquiries through other vox-channels. Eventually, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I doubt that such a conspicuous character could have slipped by unnoticed. I will inform you if the crew reports seeing anyone like that."
